mainfeatures: DC-780 high definition digital camera 2.7" TFT LCD CMOS HD display 15 Mega pixels effectual resolution 4x digital zoom 3x optical zoom 5.0MP CMOS sensor Built-in rechargeable lithium battery With flash light Exterior SD/SDHC card up to 32GB (not included) Light weight, exquisite size and fashionable design Convenient to carry and easy to put into your pocket
specifications: Model: DC-780 Image sensor: 15Mega Pixel /5.0MP CMOS sensor Image Resolution: 4480 x 3360 pixels (15MP), 4000 x 3000 (12MP), 3648 x 2736 (10MP), 3456 x 2592 (9MP), 3648 x 2048 (7MP) HD, 2592 x 1944 (5MP), 2048 x 1536 (3MP), 1920 x 1080 (2MP), HD and 640 x 480 (VGA) Video resolution: 1280 x 720 pixels (30fps), 640 x 480 pixels (30fps), 320 x 240 pixels (30fps) LCD Display: 2.7'' TFT ISO: Auto/100/200/400 External memory: SD Card (up to 32 GB) Zoom: 3x optical zoom, 4x digital zoom Exposure: ~3.0EV~+3.0EV White balance: Auto /daylight/cloudy/incandescent/fluorescent Scene: Auto/night portrait/night scenery/portrait/scenery/sport/party/beach/High sensitivity Self-timer: 2 sec/5 sec/10 sec delay File format: JPEG(Still image)/AVI(Video) Flash: Yes, IGBT (auto/force/red eye reduction/off) Pictbridge: Yes Interface: USB2.0 Anti-shake: Yes Face detect: Yes System requirements: Windows XP/Vista/7/Mac OS X (10.5 X or later) Battery: Lithium battery
systemrequirements: Windows XP/Vista/7/Mac OS X (10.5 X or later)
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camera 1 x USB cable 1 x Lithium-ion battery 1 x Battery charger 1 x CD disk 1 x User manual
videoresolution: 1280 x 720 pixels (30fps), 640 x 480 pixels (30fps), 320 x 240 pixels (30fps)
